CHAT.comment: Teaching. Mother and Child sit on floor. First Mother teaches Child to string beads. Then Mother teaches Child to sort buttons. Child is somewhat intelligible.

u.a: drops bead and it rolls away .
fumbles with wrong end of string .
takes bead , holds hole toward Child .
drops string while trying to thread bead .
drops bead and tries to retrieve .
tries; then hands bead to Mother .
puts black button in empty box .
starts to put button in box .
drops button trying to take it from Mother .
starts to put white button in box for black .
starts to put black button in box for white .
puts white button in box for white .
